summary: The Medicaid Empowerment Act of 2025 aims to amend Title XIX of the Social Security Act, focusing on Medicaid. It proposes extending the renewal periods for certain home and community-based services waivers and State plan amendments under the Medicaid program. This would extend these renewals to 10-year periods, impacting sections 1915(c)(3), 1915(h)(2), and 1915(i)(7)(C) of the Social Security Act.
